body.name: DR.PREPARE Tower Fan for Bedroom, 25 dB Quiet DC Bladeless Fan with Remote, 8 Speeds, 1-8H Timer, 80° Oscillating Fans for Indoors, 16 Inch Portable Desk Table Fan for Room, Home, Office

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 5 hrs 33 mins
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 5 hrs 33 mins
features: [12W Powerful DC Motor] Efficient DC motor delivers powerful cool winds to your living space. Up to 2000 RPM and 23 ft/s wind speed will cool you off instantly. Get your desired wind speed with ease - 8 speeds for your choice!

[Near Silent Cooling] Engineered for ultra-quiet cooling and high wind speeds. As low as 25 dB, this tower fan brings maximum comfort for your sound sleep, without unpleasant noise. Outperforming AC motors, DC motors produce quiet cooling even after long periods of work.

[Convenient Touchscreen & Remote Control] The upper control panel and smart remote controller make this table fan easy to use. You can set wind speeds, auto-off hours, oscillation, sound / sleep mode, and turn on/off the tower fan from the comfort of your couch or bed.

[1-8 Hours Timer & 80° Oscillation] User-friendly timer with the 1-hour progressive setting. Set the timer with the control panel or the remote controller. Press the SWING button to enjoy the sweeping airflow around your room.

[Easy to Clean] Detachable impeller wheel and rear guard. Clean this desk fan regularly for long-term refreshing coolness. For any questions or concerns about this tower fan, please feel free to contact us. Powered by Renogy. Comes with a reliable brand endorsement.

Safe Bladeless Design We care for your baby's and pet's curiosity, fingers, and paws as well. Control with Ease Aim at the control panel, then control the fan from the comfort of your couch/bed. Press '+' and '-' to change the SPEED & TIMER settings. Takes up Little Space Suitable for cramped spaces, like nightstands, tiny corners, narrow shelves, and more. 12W Fan (120V) Take a portable power station with you, then plug it in to enjoy the coolness anywhere! This little gadget needs only a little power.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome little fan
reviews.reviewText: This little fan rocks. Blows way over it's weight. Used in a bedroom for someone with bad hot flashes. Plenty of air even over 10ft. away. Very quiet for the amount of air it moves. Can be turned on silent mode so it doesn't make any beeps when turning it off and on or adjusting it's speed. Has 8 speeds. 6 was just right for us, for white noise and airflow. The remote was a must have to not have to get out of bed a dozen times a night and works excellent. Only had it one day so don't know about it's longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fair price for comfort
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had thing thing for a couple of weeks now and I’m thankful I bought it.I had an old Honeywell fan but it was broken to hell and I’m a big guy so I need something to keep me cool at night.This thing is a simple plug in and go kinda machine. The instructions are easy to follow and I keep it at one and it’sPerfect for a good night sleep with cool air.It’s so silent that sometimes I forget it’s even on.I haven’t cleaned it yet since it’sStill new so IHope it’s not too difficult to clean but I’ll write an update when I do that. For now, I’m just happy to have something for those hot summer days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet, love the features, a real Breeze for anywhere, Remote Control!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for bedroom, office, anywhere! Lots of wind, 8 speeds, wide oscillation, lights go off after a few minutes, timer, too! Very quiet!Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quiet, perfect for the desk or using nearby. So so as a room fan, the vent is narrow and not ideal for a room but perfect for a desk which is what I bought it for. I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because my remote hesitates sometimes and I have to press it a few times before it works which can be annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This fan is so quiet you don't know it's on. It puts out a great amount of air. Not disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke within 30 seconds of turning it on the first time
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to replace my noisy (but reliable) little desk fan with this one. In the 30 seconds that it DID work, I liked the mute function and the remote control. I also liked the multiple fan settings, and how quiet it ran on levels 1-3. That worked fine. And then...I pressed the button to have it oscillate. It turned to the left, and then it stopped forever. Everything went dark. I tried plugging in to a different socket. Tried every button on the thing. It was like it severed a wire or something? It never started to turn back to the right. So, it's getting returned and I'm on the hunt again for a quiet desk fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cools off my kids
reviews.reviewText: I keep the house a bit warm at night because my bedroom gets cold, as it's exposed to the winds from the west. But that made the boys' bedrooms a little too hot. These fans help cool of their rooms and also diffuse the heat from computers when they play video games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and space saving
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this fan!! 8 speeds, oscillates and has a timer. I keep it on my nightstand on 1-2 works and it works perfectly. Highly recommend!!
Piccolo ma potente e davvero silenzioso, è ottimo per le serate estive.
Bien ,efficace,silencieux, mais impossible de l'ouvrir pour le nettoyage, les clips sont ingérables et menacent de se rompre ....

War zuerst ein wenig skeptisch, aber nur so lange bis ich den Ventilator in Gebrauch nehmen konnte.Steht auf meinem Schreibtisch und ist wirklich sehr leise. Die Kühlung ist bei Stufe eins schon ausreichend beim Arbeiten. Der Preis ist fair. Habe davon 2 weitere gekauft.Kann ich nur weiterempfehlen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality, works great, and it's more quiet than I'd expected, so much so that at times I forget that it's on. I have it tilted more towards my ceiling where the air flow will fill the room keeping it lovely and cool and producing a really nice breeze over you now and then. It's like being outdoors in a mild intermittent breeze. Of course you can have it facing you directly or oscillating from side to side. It's a great fan, really powerful and cools you or a room down very quickly.

reviews.reviewerName: Juan Santiago Zamora AlvarezJuan Santiago Zamora Alvarez
reviews.reviewText: Tamaño ideal para la mesilla de noche, ni pequeño ni grande. Ruido y potencia: Nivel 1: no sabes que está puesto, pero tienes que tenerlo cerca. Nivel 2: algo de ruido (muy poco) y buena potencia. Nivel 3: ruido como un ventilador de techo y sales volando. En resumen, para dormir por la noche con algo de brisa en el nivel 1 o con viento en el 2 me resulta perfecto por tamaño y el diseño me gusta.
